title: School Closed for Snow Day
content: Due to severe weather conditions, school will be closed today. All classes and activities are cancelled. Stay safe!

title: Parent-Teacher Conferences
content: Parent-teacher conferences will be held next week from March 15-17. Please sign up for your preferred time slot through the parent portal.

title: Spring Break Schedule
content: Spring break will be from April 1-8. Classes will resume on April 9th. Have a wonderful and safe break!

title: New Library Hours
content: The school library will now be open from 7:30 AM to 5:00 PM Monday through Friday. Extended hours for student study sessions.

title: Graduation Ceremony Date
content: The graduation ceremony for Class of 2024 will be held on June 15th at 6:00 PM in the main auditorium. More details to follow.
